column1: #Text=Mako says : " What are you doing running around robbing people ? "
#Text=Kai says : " I was just practicing my airbending . "
#Text=" Mako says : " Your little brother , huh ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah ... just a lovable little scamp , is n't he ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Reminds me of my little brother .
#Text=" Train conductor says : " Designated express line to the lower ring .
